issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement CSV writing support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12512](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12512). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that there's a CSV writer, we should hook it up to Datasets.

It seems some refactoring will be needed to expose a full writer class for CSV so that Datasets can write batches incrementally.
